title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 June 2016 - XWiki

11:28 <vmassol> has quit  
11:40 <moep> has joined #xwiki  
11:48 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <vmassol> hi  
11:53 <vmassol> evalica: I've noticed a usability bug on a master build from 2 days ago  
11:53 <vmassol> when you edit the new home page and remove all content and hit save  
11:54 <vmassol> then the video remains…  
11:54 <vmassol> could you verify that (maybe it's been fixed)?  
11:58 <evalica> vmassol: there is no JS - the video is in an iframe - I'll test it  
11:58 <vmassol> to reproduce  
11:58 <vmassol> 1) edit in wysiwyg editor  
11:59 <vmassol> 2) select all and hit delete  
11:59 <vmassol> 3) save  
11:59 <vmassol> for some reason the video remains  
12:02 <vmassol> probably more a question for mflorea actually :)  
12:02 <evalica> vmassol: I don't reproduce on xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-8.2-20160616.123708-102.zip. I've selected all with the keybord || and with the mouse.  
12:02 <vmassol> command+A on mac to select all  
12:03 <vmassol> the wysiwyg shows an empty content after hitting dleete  
12:03 <vmassol> but if you check the source it still contains  
12:03 <vmassol> {{box cssClass="floatinginfobox"}}  
12:04 <evalica> I cannot reproduce  
12:06 <vmassol> otherwise we'll need to discuss dev of apps with nested pages; it's a major pain right now with Nested Pages. Got a lot of issues when doing my workshop  
12:06 <vmassol> I'll create a mail later on to start the discussion  
12:07 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:07 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:08 <vmassol> has quit  
12:34 <flashdel> has joined #xwiki  
12:35 <flashdel> hi folks! I am using xwiki 8.0, everything ist working fine and smooth :) Now i got one request: I would like to create a page where all my ldap groups including members are shown, is it possible to execute a bash command or sth similar in xwiki for that purpose? What would you recommend?  
12:37 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:37 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:25 <Pbas> @evalica Hi FYI I merged/refresh my old previous PR: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/515 about https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6118  
13:31 <flashdel> is it possible to ask for a variable (e.g. a field where i put in a name) and process it with velocity?  
13:32 <Pbas> yes  
13:32 <Pbas> Ask with a form?  
13:33 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
13:33 <flashdel> how do i create a form? :S  
13:35 <flashdel> can you give me a short example of a textfield with execute button?  
13:35 <Pbas> yes yes I try to find again an exampkle on xwiki.org  
13:36 <flashdel> cool  
13:40 <Pbas> Here you have 2 ways: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/FAQTutorial but thid old tuto help me a LOT to understand how to do a tiny application:  
13:40 <Pbas> http://www.theserverside.com/news/1363830/XWiki-A-Platform-for-Collaborative-Apps  
13:40 <Pbas> See http://www.theserverside.com/news/1363830/XWiki-A-Platform-for-Collaborative-Apps chapter  
13:40 <Pbas> \* Listing 3: Adding a form to add new Todo documents  
13:41 <Pbas> ho sorry it is a JS script wait  
13:43 <Pbas> Here you are: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/FAQTutorialManual#HCustomcreationform  
13:49 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
13:51 <flashdel> ok cool, thank you, i will give it a try  
13:59 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki
